pageContext.claim: “House Democrats want to negotiate a $2 TRILLION spending increase but can't even pass their own plan. We can't afford it anyway, and it’s not happening!”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats said they wanted to spend up to $2 trillion to rebuild U.S. infrastructure, including roads, bridges and schools. “Has to be at least $1 trillion, I’d like it to be closer to $2 trillion,” Pelosi told reporters. Trump himself had once proposed a $1.5 trillion infrastructure plan, mostly from the private sector; Congress would have funded $200 billion over ten years.
